attributes.action: ban the use of non-recylable packaging for all food products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to ban the use of all non recyclable plastics in supermarket food packaging and to demand bio-degradable packaging across all fast foot outlets and take-away restaurants.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban the use of non-recylable packaging for all food products."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16581
